actions.text: Amendment SA 6577 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.

Amendment SA 6577 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 6558. (consideration: CR S10069-10070; text: CR S10062) To establish a rule of construction relating to religious entities.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 6577 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6577 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 414.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6577 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 6558.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate discrimination and promote women's health and economic security by ensuring reasonable workplace accommodations for workers whose ability to perform the functions of a job are limited by pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition.

purpose: To establish a rule of construction relating to religious entities.
